example.metadescription: KoolAjax is a great PHP Ajax Framework. This examples show how to load javascript library on-demand.
example.description: KoolAjax supports loading Javascript on-demand. This feature is useful when you want your page less overhead. The script can be loaded when it is needed. To make this, you use the client-side loadScript() function of KoolAjax's instance.
